entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.0°C

Visibility: 3.2 km

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
